text: 'Record (), formerly known as Rede Record, RecordTV and Recó, is a Brazilian television network, launched by Paulo Machado de Carvalho on 1953, and bought by bishop and entrepreneur Edir Macedo on 1989.A respeito das crendices em torno dos crentesONG representará contra a Record News == References == == Other websites == * Official page * Category:Brazilian television networks
title: RecordTV
